name: LDH Pretreatment Level
title: LDH (Lactate Dehydrogenase) Pretreatment Level
notes:
**Note 1:** Use the reference ranges from your lab to determine if LDH is normal.

**Note 2:** Record this data item based on a blood test performed at diagnosis (pre-treatment). In the absence of the lab test, a physicianâ€™s statement of the exact value or interpretation can be used. Use the highest value available.

**Note 3:** If there is no mention of the LDH, code 9.
rows:
Normal LDH level
Low, below normal
Test ordered, results not in chart

Not documented in medical record
Serum LDH (Lactate Dehydrogenase) Pretreatment Level not assessed or unknown if assessed
